Birmingham Post-Herald
April 2®, 1961
’ ETV convention
Arriving today from 11 states
are 200 educational broadcasters
and their wives, Who will attend
the two day regional convention
at the Thomas Jefferson Hotel.
Addressing the group at break¬
fast Saturday morning in the
hotel will be William Harley,
NAEB president.
Dr. John Schwarzwalder,
manager, KTCA-TV, St. Paul
Minnesota, will speak at a
